testcaseName: Hep B: Patient is 18 years and has received a previous dose of Hep B vaccine and two doses of Hep B (Heplisav) vaccine
generalDescription: This test case describes when a patient is administered a previous dose of Hep B vaccine (at age 15) and two doses of the Hep B (Heplisav) vaccine at 8 weeks a part, that the doses are considered valid.  The series is complete.
reasonForChange:
V4.2: Mild adjustments to relative date settings to avoid administration dates in the future. Test case expectations (e.g, evaluation status or forecast) have not changed.
v4.1: Updated dose #1 to reflect a valid dose based on Ask the Expert guidance
v3.5: Updated dose #1 to reflect an invalid dose reason of Vaccine Dose Administered was administered at too young of an age.
